Title: Rere no Aoi Sora
Description: ['Music video for the song ', Rere no Aoi Sora, ' by Japanese stringed musician Kiyoshi Kobayashi under the pseudonym "Ukulele Ojisan" that was featured on NHK\'s Minna no Uta program. It was included as the title track on a two-disc CD produced by Nippon Columbia that same month, which included various other songs from the Minna no Uta catalog.']
